moduleMetadataJson.name: Android Root Remove Device Locks (root)
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module uses root privileges to remove the device lock.
            In some cases the original lock method will still be present but any key/gesture will
            unlock the device.
author: timwr

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
